title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 253.1 - Parties; nonjoinder and misjoinder
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 253.1 - Parties; nonjoinder and misjoinder

State Regulations

No proceeding will be dismissed because of nonjoinder or
misjoinder of parties. Upon motion of any party or the board's agent, parties
may be added, dropped or substituted at any stage of the proceedings, upon such
terms as may be deemed proper. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
